text: Enrique José Bolaños Geyer (13 May 1928 - 14 June 2021) was a Nicaraguan politician. He was the President of Nicaragua from 10 January, 2002 to 10 January, 2007. Bolaños died in Nindirí, Nicaragua on 14 June 2021, just one month after his 93rd birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== *Biography and tenure by CIDOB Foundation (in Spanish) Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Presidents of Nicaragua Category:Vice presidents of Nicaragua
title: Enrique Bolaños
